title: Life in a pond
brief_description: Illustrates pond life in action, providing examples of important principals of natural science. Shows in microscopic and underwater scenes the variety of self-sustaining plants and animals found in a typical fresh water pond, among them the shoreward, floating, and submerges green plants and water fleas, beetles, insect larvae, dragonfly nymphs, and minnows.
